title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is $$2$$, it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to $$0$$.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Add $$2$$ to both sides of the inequality and get $$4x$$ is greater than and equal to $$2$$.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Divide both sides of the inequality by $$4$$ which gives $$x$$ is greater than and equal to $$\frac{1}{2}$$. We can turn it into interval notation as $$[\frac{1}{2},\infty)$$.
